Class Task2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Task2

  • public class Task2
extends java.lang.Object
    Task for HH school

    Finding count of ways to split number n on k partitions.

    There following conditions: - 1 <= n <= 150, 1 <= k <= n

    Since:
    09.10.2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Volobuev-AN

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Entry point to application
      Two possible ways to get initial values:
      1) From arguments of application: java Task2.class n k
      2) Dialog with a user: Input n and k parameters:6 3 PRESS ENTER
      static void recurentPartition(int nSum, int nNum, int nVal)
      Recurent function to implement algorithm of reverse lexographic search (Knut's book, part 4A), example:
      n - 6, k - 3
      step 1: 114
      step 2: 123
      step 3: 222
      result: 3
